description:
D-Agency receives an urgent meeting request from one of their collaborators, 
Morozoff, who has important secret information to report. 
D-Agency member Seto Reiji arranges to meet him on the South Manchurian Railway Asia Super Express. 
As Seto moves to collect the information, he finds Morozoff has been murdered.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: アジア・エクスプレス
